import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import BackTotop from './back_to_top' import Footer from './footer' import Navbar from './navbar' import TrendingCourses from './trending_courses' const Cart = () => { const [cart, Setcart] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { let cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) if (cart) { Setcart(cart) } }, []) return ( <>
Your Cart is empty
Your Shopping Cart {cart.map((item,index)=>{ })} {/*

Size: M
Color: Grey

$20.00
*/}
) } export default Cart
